sql.if: and ( room_no like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or use_purpose like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or capacity like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
and ( name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or class_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or subject_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or subdetail_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )

mapper.select:
select * from classroom where room_code is not null
order by room_no
select * from classroom order by room_no
select count(*) from classroom where room_code is not null
select room_code ,room_no ,room_floor ,capacity ,use_purpose from classroom order by room_no
select room_code ,room_no ,room_floor ,capacity ,use_purpose ,picture from classroom where room_code = #{roomCode}
select room_code ,room_no ,room_floor ,capacity ,use_purpose from classroom where room_no = #{roomNo}
select room_no_seq.nextval from dual
select usefixture_seq.nextval from dual
select fxtcode, fxtname, fxticon from fixture
select a.fixuseno, a.room_code, a.fxtcode, b.fxticon from usefixt a, fixture b where a.fxtcode = b.fxtcode
select a.fixuseno, a.room_code, a.fxtcode, b.fxticon from usefixt a, fixture b where a.fxtcode = b.fxtcode and a.room_code=#{roomCode}

select a.room_code ,a.room_no ,b.time_code , b.classday , b.ctperiod , c.class_code , c.start_date , c.end_date , b.start_time , b.end_time from classroom a, time_detail b, class c where a.room_code = b.room_code and b.class_code = c.class_code and c.cpcheck='3' order by a.room_no

select a.room_code ,a.room_no ,b.time_code , b.classday , b.ctperiod , c.class_code , c.start_date , c.end_date , b.start_time , b.end_time from classroom a, time_detail b, class c where a.room_code = b.room_code and b.class_code = c.class_code and c.cpcheck='3' and b.room_code=#{roomCode} and b.classday=#{classday} order by a.room_no

select distinct c.class_code from classroom a, time_detail b, class c where a.room_code = b.room_code and b.class_code = c.class_code
and c.start_date <= to_date(sysdate) and c.end_date >= to_date(sysdate) and a.room_code=#{roomCode}

select b.class_code ,b.class_rank ,b.class_name ,b.id ,b.subdetail_code ,b.cpno ,b.start_date ,b.end_date ,b.class_price ,b.total_time ,b.class_grade ,b.subdetail_name ,b.subject_code ,b.subject_name ,b.name ,b.stu_cnt ,min(b.start_time) as mintime from (select a.class_code ,a.class_rank ,a.class_name ,a.id ,a.subdetail_code ,a.cpno ,a.start_date ,a.end_date ,a.class_price ,a.total_time ,a.class_grade ,a.stu_cnt ,b.subdetail_name ,b.subject_code ,c.subject_name ,d.name ,e.start_time from class a, subdetail b, subject c, member d, time_detail e, classroom f where a.subdetail_code = b.subdetail_code and b.subject_code=c.subject_code and a.id = d.id and e.class_code = a.class_code and e.room_code = f.room_code and a.cpcheck='3' and f.room_code = #{roomCode} and e.classday=#{classday}
and a.start_date <= to_date(sysdate) and a.end_date>= to_date(sysdate) ) b where class_code is not null group by b.class_code ,b.class_rank ,b.class_name ,b.id ,b.subdetail_code ,b.cpno ,b.start_date ,b.end_date ,b.class_price ,b.total_time ,b.class_grade ,b.subdetail_name ,b.subject_code ,b.subject_name ,b.name ,b.stu_cnt
select count(*) from( select fixuseno ,room_code ,fxtcode from usefixt where room_code = #{roomCode} and fxtcode = #{fxtcode}) a
